# The `PreservedAnalysisChecker` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A checker object that makes it easy to query for whether an analysis or some set covering it is preserved. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::PreservedAnalyses::PreservedAnalysisChecker</CodeBlock>

  name={<><a href="#a4a23e26ba9eb94d4f75bc75bb459a6fa">PreservedAnalysisChecker</a> (const PreservedAnalyses &amp;PA, AnalysisKey &#42;ID)</>}>
A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker">PreservedAnalysisChecker</a> is tied to a particular Analysis because <code><a href="#a2f84945a09787006fe8e0c94e1de89f1">preserved()</a></code> and <code><a href="#abaaa2690a96aed712836f8f292d8128c">preservedSet()</a></code> both return false if the Analysis was abandoned. <a href="#a4a23e26ba9eb94d4f75bc75bb459a6fa">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A checker object that makes it easy to query for whether an analysis or some set covering it is preserved.

Definition at line 222 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/analysis-h">Analysis.h</a>.

## Private Constructors

### PreservedAnalysisChecker() {#a4a23e26ba9eb94d4f75bc75bb459a6fa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::PreservedAnalyses::PreservedAnalysisChecker::PreservedAnalysisChecker (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp; PA, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> &#42; ID)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker">PreservedAnalysisChecker</a> is tied to a particular Analysis because <code><a href="#a2f84945a09787006fe8e0c94e1de89f1">preserved()</a></code> and <code><a href="#abaaa2690a96aed712836f8f292d8128c">preservedSet()</a></code> both return false if the Analysis was abandoned.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/analysis-h/#l00232">232</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/analysis-h">Analysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### preserved() {#a2f84945a09787006fe8e0c94e1de89f1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PreservedAnalyses::PreservedAnalysisChecker::preserved ()"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if the checker&#39;s analysis was not abandoned and either.

<ul>
<li>the analysis is explicitly preserved or</li>
<li>all analyses are preserved.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/analysis-h/#l00239">239</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/analysis-h">Analysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### preservedSet() {#abaaa2690a96aed712836f8f292d8128c}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename AnalysisSetT&gt;</>}
  prototype="bool llvm::PreservedAnalyses::PreservedAnalysisChecker::preservedSet ()"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if the checker&#39;s analysis was not abandoned and either.

<ul>
<li><code>AnalysisSetT</code> is explicitly preserved or</li>
<li>all analyses are preserved.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/analysis-h/#l00252">252</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/analysis-h">Analysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### preservedWhenStateless() {#a48ecc8b3108b550239565f675adfd6f8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PreservedAnalyses::PreservedAnalysisChecker::preservedWhenStateless ()"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return true if the checker&#39;s analysis was not abandoned, i.e.

it was not explicitly invalidated. Even if the analysis is not explicitly preserved, if the analysis is known stateless, then it is preserved.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/analysis-h/#l00247">247</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/analysis-h">Analysis.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
